There were no other sightings in Leesburg on or around October 29th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsGoing home I noticed on Hibler Road I noticed a Bright red light which I thought was the smoke stacks behind our property, but wasn't. It was a bright read light stationary in the sky. I then noticed a plane moving toward Dulles Airport. The Red Light started moving toward the plane which was miles from it. It started closing in rapidly to the plane. Once it caught up to the plane, both objects dissapeared.
